vehicles.description: A light-colored sedan directly ahead in the same lane as the ego vehicle, apparently moving in the same direction.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle sets the pace for the ego vehicle and constrains its ability to speed up or change lanes.

vehicles.description: Blue car in the opposite lane, moving in the opposite direction.
vehicles.explanation: Presence suggests that visibility is clear and traffic is flowing in both directions.

other objects.description: There is debris on the road: at least three black objects scattered in the ego vehicle's lane ahead.
other objects.explanation: This debris poses a potential hazard and requires the ego vehicle to maneuver around it to avoid damage.

suggestions: Maintain a safe following distance behind the silver sedan, monitoring its speed and brake lights for changes in traffic flow. Prepare to make a lane change if the debris ahead becomes an obstacle and there is a safe opportunity to do so. Keep speed consistent with the flow of the surrounding traffic while remaining vigilant for any changes in the road conditions or traffic patterns.
